original_text: And his brothers were jealous of him, but his father kept the saying in mind.
korean_text: 그의 형들은 시기하되 그의 아버지는 그 말을 간직해 두었더라

sentences.original_text: And his brothers were jealous of him
but his father kept the saying in mind
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그의 아버지는 그 말씀을 마음에 새겼습니다
